entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
